Uses of Class
org.hibernate.type.NClobType

  • Packages that use NClobType 
    Package Description
    org.hibernate.type
    A Hibernate Type is a strategy for mapping a Java property type to a JDBC type or types.

    • Uses of NClobType in org.hibernate.type

      Fields in org.hibernate.type declared as NClobType 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static NClobType NClobType.INSTANCE 
      static NClobType StandardBasicTypes.NCLOB
      The standard Hibernate type for mapping NClob to JDBC NCLOB.
